name: Invisible Woman

abilities.name: Force Bolt
abilities.details: Projects fast bolts of solid psionic force.

abilities.name: Force Field
abilities.details: Creates durable invisible force fields to block attacks. Can be placed on allies or ground.

abilities.name: Invisibility
abilities.details: Turns herself or a nearby ally invisible for ~5 seconds.

ultimate.name: Crushing Force
ultimate.effect: Creates immense pressure fields in a target area, crushing and stunning enemies caught inside.
ultimate.details: Unleashes the destructive potential of her force fields after a brief delay.

passives.name: Second Sight
passives.details: Invisible enemies near Sue are partially revealed to her.

teamups.effect: Force Field cooldown reduced when near FF members.

lore: Susan Storm Richards gained the power to become invisible and project powerful psionic force fields after cosmic ray exposure. She is a core member of the Fantastic Four.
